title: Why haven't i a free win ?
body:
i was in a promo to go P5 yesterday. I fail to promote... Then i keep playing, and now in promo again. But i have no free win. 
Why ? shouldn't i start with 1 w and just need to win the other.

replies.body: Always Wurf It is spot on here. You don't get promo helpers once you're in Plat, since it's a much more competitive tier. Make sure to double check the [**Ranked Play FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h2q3) for these kinds of questions ^_^!

from bronze 5 to gold 1 you have a free win.
starting with plat 5 promos included to challenger, you no longer have a free win.
